These elements are changed from their defaults via JavaScript





This article is only visible on print.

This article is only visible on screen.

This article is always visible.

This article has a solid border on screen and a dashed border on print.

This article has a hover event.

This article is inside a section, uses time to display July 4th, 1776, and has an indent on screen, but not on print.

This article is also inside a section and has marking.

This article is inside an article inside a section and has an indent on print, but not on screen.
